name: 蔣欣翰
objective:
先修課程：微積分或負責教授同意
常微分方程式，線性常微分方程式，拉普拉氏轉換，級數及傅立葉級數，線性代數及矩陣，積分定理。
Ordinary Differential Equations, Linear Ordinary Differential Equations, Laplace Transform, Series.
schedule:
Week 1:      		Overview; Engineering Mathematics
Week 2-4:          	First-order ordinary differential equations 
Week 4-7:                Second-order ordinary differential equations
Week 7-9:        	Higher-order ordinary differential equations
Week 10:         	Midterm 
Week 11-13:      	Systems of ordinary differential equations (ODE)
Week 13-15:      	Series for solutions of ODE
Week 15-17:      	Laplace transform
Week 18:           	Final
materials:
Text Book:
Advanced Engineering Mathematics, Erwin Kreyszig, 10th Ed.
ISBN 9781119934165
consultation: TA: 黃丞廷 e-mail: teryhuang89@gmail.com 研究室位置：綜科館 B10-31
remarks: 本學期原則採實體授課方式；因應疫情警戒標準，本學期教學及授課方式請依照學校網頁所公布之訊息為準：(https://oaa.ntut.edu.tw/p/404-1008-98622.php?Lang=zh-tw) 1. 相關課程公告與相關事項將會發布於 Google classroom (開學後建立)。2. 若因 COVID-19 疫情影響將提供 Google Meet 或 Microsoft teams 線上同步教學。
